title: Agents
subtitle: Create and manage AI agents for different tasks
empty: No agents configured. Create your first agent to get started.
gatewayWarning: Gateway is not running. Agent changes will take effect after the gateway starts.

dialog.assignedSkillsHint: Select which skills this agent can use. Only enabled skills are shown.
dialog.noSkillsAvailable: No skills are enabled. Enable skills from the Skills page first.
dialog.agentIdHint: Unique identifier (lowercase, no spaces). Cannot be changed later.
dialog.name: Name
dialog.modelHint: Model name. Leave empty to use the default model from settings.
dialog.providerHint: Select an AI provider. Only providers with API keys configured in Settings are shown.
dialog.systemPromptPlaceholder: You are an AI agent that...
dialog.systemPromptHint: Instructions that define this agent's behavior and capabilities.

toast.created: Agent created successfully. Gateway is restarting...
toast.saved: Agent saved successfully. Gateway is restarting...
toast.deleted: Agent deleted successfully. Gateway is restarting...
